hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT EOTO.EOTO_ID as EOOR_ID, EOTO.CREATOR as CREATOR, EOTO.CREATE_TIME as CREATE_TIME, EOTO.MODIFIER as MODIFIER, EOTO.MODIFY_TIME as MODIFY_TIME, EOTO.REC_VER as REC_VER, EOTO.REC_STATUS as REC_STATUS, EOTO.ORG_ID as ORG_ID, EOTO.EOTO_LOGISTIC_NO as EOOR_LOGISTIC_NO, EOTO.EOTO_ORDER_TYPE_CODE as EOOR_ORDER_TYPE_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_ORDER_TYPE_NAME as EOOR_ORDER_TYPE_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_PRIORITY_CODE as EOOR_PRIORITY_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_PRIORITY_NAME as EOOR_PRIORITY_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_TRANS_TYPE_CODE as EOOR_TRANS_TYPE_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_TRANS_TYPE_NAME as EOOR_TRANS_TYPE_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_CUSTOMER_CODE as EOOR_CUSTOMER_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_CUSTOMER_NAME as EOOR_CUSTOMER_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_CUSTOMER_CONTACT_CODE as EOOR_CUSTOMER_CONTACT_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_CUSTOMER_CONTACT_NAME as EOOR_CUSTOMER_CONTACT_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_CUSTOMER_CONTACT_PHONE as EOOR_CUSTOMER_CONTACT_PHONE, EOTO.EOTO_ORDER_TIME as EOOR_ORDER_TIME, EOTO.EOTO_DIVIDE_CODE as EOOR_DIVIDE_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_DIVIDE_NAME as EOOR_DIVIDE_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_REQUIRE_SHIPPER_TIME_FM as EOOR_REQUIRE_SHIPPER_TIME_FM, EOTO.EOTO_REQUIRE_SHIPPER_TIME_TO as EOOR_REQUIRE_SHIPPER_TIME_TO, EOTO.EOTO_REQUIRE_CONSIGNEE_TIME_FM as EOOR_REQUIRE_CONSIGNEE_TIME_FM, EOTO.EOTO_REQUIRE_CONSIGNEE_TIME_TO as EOOR_REQUIRE_CONSIGNEE_TIME_TO, EOTO.EOTO_ORDER_DEPARTMENT_CODE as EOOR_ORDER_DEPARTMENT_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_ORDER_DEPARTMENT_NAME as EOOR_ORDER_DEPARTMENT_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_OPERATE_DEPARTMENT_CODE as EOOR_OPERATE_DEPARTMENT_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_OPERATE_DEPARTMENT_NAME as EOOR_OPERATE_DEPARTMENT_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_SHIPPER_CODE as EOOR_SHIPPER_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_SHIPPER_NAME as EOOR_SHIPPER_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_SHIPPER_CONTACT_CODE as EOOR_SHIPPER_CONTACT_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_SHIPPER_CONTACT_NAME as EOOR_SHIPPER_CONTACT_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_SHIPPER_CONTACT_PHONE as EOOR_SHIPPER_CONTACT_PHONE, EOTO.EOTO_SHIPPER_LOCATION_CODE as EOOR_SHIPPER_LOCATION_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_SHIPPER_LOCATION_NAME as EOOR_SHIPPER_LOCATION_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_SHIPPER_REGION_CODE as EOOR_SHIPPER_REGION_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_SHIPPER_REGION_NAME as EOOR_SHIPPER_REGION_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_SHIPPER_CITY_CODE as EOOR_SHIPPER_CITY_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_SHIPPER_CITY_NAME as EOOR_SHIPPER_CITY_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_SHIPPER_DISTRICT_CODE as EOOR_SHIPPER_DISTRICT_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_SHIPPER_DISTRICT_NAME as EOOR_SHIPPER_DISTRICT_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_CONSIGNEE_CODE as EOOR_CONSIGNEE_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_CONSIGNEE_NAME as EOOR_CONSIGNEE_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_CONSIGNEE_CONTACT_CODE as EOOR_CONSIGNEE_CONTACT_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_CONSIGNEE_CONTACT_NAME as EOOR_CONSIGNEE_CONTACT_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_CONSIGNEE_CONTACT_PHONE as EOOR_CONSIGNEE_CONTACT_PHONE, EOTO.EOTO_CONSIGNEE_LOCATION_CODE as EOOR_CONSIGNEE_LOCATION_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_CONSIGNEE_LOCATION_NAME as EOOR_CONSIGNEE_LOCATION_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_CONSIGNEE_REGION_CODE as EOOR_CONSIGNEE_REGION_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_CONSIGNEE_REGION_NAME as EOOR_CONSIGNEE_REGION_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_CONSIGNEE_CITY_CODE as EOOR_CONSIGNEE_CITY_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_CONSIGNEE_CITY_NAME as EOOR_CONSIGNEE_CITY_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_CONSIGNEE_DISTRICT_CODE as EOOR_CONSIGNEE_DISTRICT_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_CONSIGNEE_DISTRICT_NAME as EOOR_CONSIGNEE_DISTRICT_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_PO_NO as EOOR_PO_NO, EOTO.EOTO_SO_NO as EOOR_SO_NO, EOTO.EOTO_DO_NO as EOOR_DO_NO, EOTO.EOTO_BARCODE as EOOR_BARCODE, EOTO.EOTO_PACKAGE_QUANTITY as EOOR_PACKAGE_QUANTITY, EOTO.EOTO_QUANTITY as EOOR_QUANTITY, EOTO.EOTO_GROSS_WEIGHT as EOOR_GROSS_WEIGHT, EOTO.EOTO_NET_WEIGHT as EOOR_NET_WEIGHT, EOTO.EOTO_VOLUME as EOOR_VOLUME, EOTO.EOTO_REQUIREMENT as EOOR_REQUIREMENT, EOTO.EOTO_REMARK as EOOR_REMARK, EOTO.EOTO_EXPIRATION_TIME as EOOR_EXPIRATION_TIME, EOTO.EOTO_RESERVATION as EOOR_RESERVATION, EOTO.EOTO_SALESMAN_CODE as EOOR_SALESMAN_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_SALESMAN_NAME as EOOR_SALESMAN_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_EMERGENT_FLAG as EOOR_EMERGENT_FLAG, EOTO.EOTO_PAYMENT_TYPE_CODE as EOOR_PAYMENT_TYPE_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_PAYMENT_TYPE_NAME as EOOR_PAYMENT_TYPE_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_WAREHOUSER_CODE as EOOR_WAREHOUSER_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_WAREHOUSER_NAME as EOOR_WAREHOUSER_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_STATION_CODE as EOOR_STATION_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_STATION_NAME as EOOR_STATION_NAME, EOTO.EOTO_EVENT_OBJECT_CODE AS EOOR_EVENT_OBJECT_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_EVENT_OBJECT_NAME AS EOOR_EVENT_OBJECT_NAME FROM EO_TEMPLATE_ORDER EOTO WHERE 1=1 << AND EOTO.EOTO_CODE LIKE :code>> << AND EOTO.ORG_ID =:orgId >>
